bibl.bibl: Scott, John. 1862b. On the propagation and irritability of Drosera and Dionaea. [Read 11 December 1862.] Transactions of the Botanical Society [of Edinburgh] 7 (1863): 429–30. [Abstract of paper. Abstracts also appeared in the notice of the proceedings of the Botanical Society of Edinburgh in the Edinburgh New Philosophical Journal n.s. 17 (1863): 317–18 and in the Gardeners’ Chronicle, 10 January 1863, p. 30.]
